entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 10:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
